meanings.definition: Not freezing or subject to freezing.
meanings.sent1: The nonfreezing weather allowed us to enjoy a pleasant walk outside.
meanings.sent2: The nonfreezing temperatures in the greenhouse kept the plants healthy.
meanings.sent3: I was relieved when the nonfreezing forecast meant I didn't have to scrape ice off my car.
meanings.sent4: The nonfreezing river flowed smoothly through the valley, reflecting the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The nonfreezing lake shimmered under the clear blue sky, inviting swimmers to dive in.

meanings.definition: Remaining unfrozen or not becoming frozen.
meanings.sent1: The nonfreezing ice cream stayed creamy even in the hot sun.
meanings.sent2: The nonfreezing liquid nitrogen was essential for the scientific experiment.
meanings.sent3: I was surprised to find the nonfreezing popsicle still intact after being left out all day.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like nonfreezing sunshine, warming everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The nonfreezing glacier slowly carved its path through the mountain, leaving a majestic trail.
